sentences.en: Bergson etc. Thus, they have clear traces of modernist thoughts.
sentences.cn: 因此, 他们具有明显的现代主义思想的痕迹.

sentences.en: But craves in the modernist school music family, between the member quarrels frequently continuous.
sentences.cn: 而热衷于现代派音乐的家庭, 成员之间经常争吵不休.

sentences.en: Compare that kind of ambiguity with the typical modernist ambiguity of Harold Pinter'say Party.
sentences.cn: 我们且把这种含糊不清与哈罗德·品特的《生日晚会》中典型现代主义的含糊不清做一比较.

sentences.en: Different conceptions of modernity between Habermas and the Modernist result in opposite viewpoints on modern culture.
sentences.cn: 对现代性的不同理解是哈贝马斯和后现代主义者思想分歧的根本原因.

sentences.en: First published in 1918, My Antonia is generally considered a modernist novel.
sentences.cn: 《我的安东妮亚》首次出版于1918年, 被一致认为是现代主义小说.

sentences.en: Held's attempt to link his vision with that of the Renaissance can also be considered Post - Modernist .
sentences.cn: 他把自己的视觉与文艺复兴风格联系起来的尝试也被视为后 现代主义.

sentences.en: Hi - tech materials set the pace for this rugged range - modernist gear that will go the distance.
sentences.cn: 高科技材料的速度为崎岖的范围 - 现代设备,将去的距离.

sentences.en: It's totally reasonable if the essence of modernist unveiled.
sentences.cn: 如果揭开现代主义绘画那浓雾般的面纱观其本质,是完全可以理解的.

sentences.en: Jessica is dressed in a smart way, she looks like a typical modernist.
sentences.cn: 杰西卡穿着很时髦, 是个典型的现代派.

sentences.en: Joseph Conrad is a very important modernist writer at the turn of the 20 th century.
sentences.cn: 康拉德是19世纪末20世纪初重要的英语作家之一.

sentences.en: Last week , I found it transformed into a forest of neon - lit, modernist skyscrapers.
sentences.cn: 最近我发现,这片地区已脱胎换骨,到处林立着霓虹闪烁的现代化高楼.

sentences.en: Modernist's style to choose self modern curtain commercial firm, giving your accommodatingto is best.
sentences.cn: 现代人的风格应当选自现代窗帘商行, 给你们的就是最好的.

sentences.en: So Walter Benjamin support the Modernist art like Expressionism.
sentences.cn: 所以本雅明拥护表现主义等现代艺术.

sentences.en: The building is impeccably modernist: glass, aluminium and grey.
sentences.cn: 这座楼完全是现代主义风格：采用玻璃和铝质材料，以灰色作为基调。

sentences.en: There was a return to ornamentation—and there was a frivolity—something over and above the brutal structural form of the old modernist designs.
sentences.cn: 有对装饰的回归——有轻浮——那是一些凌驾于老套的现代主义设计这种残忍的结构形式的东西。

sentences.en: Thus , Held's painting , because of its complexity and illusionism, can be considered Post - Modernist.
sentences.cn: 由此, 赫尔德那些呈现错综性和错觉艺术手法的绘画被视为后现代主义.
